page.title: 06Housing
page.content: Private housing is scattred throughout the area. Before the council estates were built ,there was no concentration of houses. {Hill Park}estate was built on farm land. The council bought the farmland, the farm house still stands at the top of Hill Park . Mr. Cyril Pilby lived in the farm when the council bought it. Mr.P. Morgan lives there now. The estate was built in 1966. There were 22 houses each had three bedrooms, a kitchen and a living room and a garage. In 1967 some bungalows were built along the main road. They have two bedrooms, a living room and a kitchen.Some have garages. THere are 18 of them. 1980 8 bungalows were built at tne top of the park for private property
